description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft desktopimgdownldr execution with parameters used to download files from the Internet Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Suspicious Desktopimgdownldr Command
query: ((process.command_line:*\ \/lockscreenurl\:* AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*.jpg* OR *.jpeg* OR *.png*)))) OR (process.command_line:*reg\ delete* AND process.command_line:*\\PersonalizationCSP*))
